ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: Very true, if he was really Sorry about doing this to you guys  all he would do is hit each gnoll with engulphing darkness or something similar.  You would
ygData.messageBody:
Very true, if he was really "Sorry about doing this to you guys" all he
would do is hit each gnoll with engulphing darkness or something
similar. You would get the kills (faster even) and he would get
faction. Not to mention it would slow the gnoll's running (which I
think those guys do...)

> In future, ask the Necromancer to share by throwing a low-level dot on each
> gnoll. That way he'll get faction, your downtime goes down, and everyone's
> happy. That's what I did with Minos in Steamfont - just one whack gives
> you faction ;)

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
